scheme_name: Integrated Horticulture Development Plan Scheme for Scheduled Caste Families
description: The Integrated Horticulture Development Plan Scheme supports Scheduled Caste families in Haryana to undertake horticulture activities for income generation.
key_features: Subsidies for horticulture inputs and equipment
Focus on fruit and vegetable cultivation

steps: Submit caste certificate and land documents

special_notes: Aims to uplift SC families through horticulture
